bioAsHtml: Deepu K Sasidharan is the co-lead for JHipster and he works for XebiaLabs. He has over 7 years of experience in architecture and design of enterprise applications on JVM. He is also a JavaScript evangelist and OSS aficionado with many contributions for the JS and Java community, his most notable contributions are for the JHipster community.

acceptedTalks.title: JHipster: what's new in our Spring/Summer 2018 collection

bio: Deepu K Sasidharan is the co-lead for [JHipster](https://jhipster.github.io) and he works for [XebiaLabs](https://xebialabs.com). He has over 7 years of experience in architecture and design of enterprise applications on JVM. He is also a JavaScript evangelist and OSS aficionado with many contributions for the JS and Java community, his most notable contributions are for the JHipster community.
